title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Children, Equality, Disability,
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) 
Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 2 May 2025. 

Irish
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited child equality disability integration youth (alteration name department title minister) order 2025 (2) order come operation 2 may 2025 irish

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the 
language, an Roinn Leanaí, Comhionannais, Míchumais, 
Lánpháirtíochta agus Óige and, in the English language, the Department of 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, is altered, in the Irish 
language, to that of an Roinn Leanaí, Míchumais agus Comhionannais and, in 
the English language, to that of the Department of Children, Disability and 
Equality.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name language roinn leanai comhionannais michumais lanphairtiochta agus oige english language department child equality disability integration youth altered irish language roinn leanai michumais agus comhionannais english language department child disability equality

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Leanaí, Comhionannais, 
Míchumais, Lánpháirtíochta agus Óige and, in the English language, the 
Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth is altered, in 
the Irish language, to that of an tAire Leanaí, Míchumais agus Comhionannais 
and, in the English language, to that of the Minister for Children, Disability and 
Equality.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire leanai comhionannais michumais lanphairtiochta agus oige english language minister child equality disability integration youth altered irish language taire leanai michumais agus comhionannais english language minister child disability equality

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment -
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment - 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth shall be construed as references to the 
Department of Children, Disability and Equality, and 

references to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth shall be construed as references to the 
Minister for Children, Disability and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 2nd May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [180] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Government, 
29 April, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
